name: Foundation (HTML, CSS, Data, SVG Map)
goal: Create the basic application shell with all static assets

prds.description: HTML skeleton with responsive two-panel layout (map left, game right on desktop; stacked on mobile)
steps: Verify map panel on left, game panel on right
Verify stacked layout with map on top

prds.description: CSS styling with custom properties for colors and theming
steps: Verify CSS custom properties defined for all colors
Verify dark theme applied to page background

Verify each path has data-county='{Name}' attribute
